monte-carlo-credentials.name: Monte Carlo Credentials
monte-carlo-credentials.description: Block used to manage Monte Carlo authentication.
monte-carlo-credentials.code_example:
Load stored Monte Carlo credentials:
```python
from prefect_monte_carlo.credentials import MonteCarloCredentials
montecarlo_credentials_block = MonteCarloCredentials.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```
